contentList.content: Sentient Song
A magical enchantment allows anyone to play this instrument with <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag>.
Catchy Tune
Your previously played song is still stuck in your head.
A bard playing a song restores one charge of Bardic Inspiration, but must wait before they can restore another.
A bard playing this song restores one charge of Bardic Inspiration, but must wait before they can restore another.
Play your instrument to restore two of your Bardic Inspiration slots.
Fashionable Backpack
A stylish canvas bag with leather straps. The envy of any adventurer!
Your carrying capacity is increased to 120% of its base value.
Psionic Alarm
You cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>.
Shoulder-Mounted Leather Frog
A solid leather base with sturdy straps used to comfortably and securely attach a weapon to your back.
Securely Fastened

While you have a Glaive, Greatclub, Halberd, Maul, Pike, Quarterstaff, Spear, Trident, or Warhammer equipped in your main hand and nothing in your free hand, your primary attacks are <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_UnarmedAttack">Unarmed Strikes</LSTag>.
Annotated Map of the Sword Coast
A map covered in notes marking places of interest. Has an atlas on the back filled with useful facts on the region.
Eversmoking Bottle
Smoke leaks from the lead-stoppered mouth of this brass bottle.
Use an action to open the bottle and create a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="">Fog Cloud</LSTag> in a 5 foot radius around the caster. You can use another action to remove the cloud.
Decanter of Endless Mead
Now matter how much you pour, the jug never seems to get lighter.
Contact Buzz
Simply holding this decanter is enough to make you feel <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DRUNK">Drunk</LSTag>.
Rope of Mending
Wrapping this around a damaged object or construct will magically repair it.
Curious Copper Coin
This otherwise unassuming coin hums with magical energy.
Coin Toss

Toss the coin at an unoccupied space on the ground, creating the illusion of several coins tumbling down, compelling nearby creatures to investigate. The coin then immediately returns to its owner, leaving behind an illusory duplicate in its place.
Illusory Coin
Balance of Harmony
This scale bears celestial symbols on one pan and fiendish symbols on the other.
Galder's Bubble Pipe
A pipe once belonging to the legendary wizard Galder Fendt the Immortal.
Triage Kit
A collection of tools used for treating wounds in the field.
Tend Injuries
Tend to a creatures wounds, healing them. The target must wait before they can be tended to again.
Tender Loving Care
You've recently been medically tended to.
Pole of Collapsing
An enchanted wooden rod that can extend or collapse.
Pole Vaulting
Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">Jump</LSTag> distance is increased by [1].
Portable Whetstone
A sharp stone used for keeping slashing and piercing weapons ready for battle.
Apply Whetstone
Sharpen your currently equipped piercing or slashing melee weapon, receiving a +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> and Damage Rolls.
Sharpened
+1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> and Damage Rolls.
The trinket that grants this spell must stay on the spellcaster's person.
Belt of Dwarvenkind
A well made thick leather belt with a square runic carving on the front.
Dwarven Excellence
A dwarf wearing this belt has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Intimidation">Intimidation</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Persuasion">Persuasion</LSTag> checks.
Candle of Lawful Invocation
A slender taper dedicated to various lawful deities.
Holy Warmth
Infuse your weapon with light.
Additionally, a druid or cleric gains an additional 1st level <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.
Efficient Quiver
Contains a small extradimensional space capable of holding more than the average quiver.
Greatarrows
When you deal damage with a ranged weapon attack, you have a chance to apply <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Arrow Printer
<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MainHandAttack">Ranged Attack</LSTag> can fire an additional projectile.
Replenish an expended <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag> up to 3rd level.
Pearl of Power
This seemingly normal pearl of average size and luster is a potent aid to all spellcasters.
Wind Fan
An enchanted fan capable of creating a powerful burst of air.
Hourglass of Distorted Perception
The sands of time lie within.
Turn The Hourglass
Become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HASTE">Hastened</LSTag>: gain an action, become faster and gain +2 to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
Ruby of the War Mage
A powerful gem favored by wizards who prefer settling their arguments up close.

Attach the ruby to your main hand melee weapon, adding your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability Modifier</LSTag> to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> instead of your Strength or Dexterity.
Lens of Astute Observation
Holding the lens to your eye fills you with magical energy.
Shielding Brooch
A turtle shaped brooch that protects whoever holds it.
Forceful Deflection
Grants <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Force damage. Immune to Magic Missile.
Docent
A small metal construct about 2 inches across studded with dragonshards.
Professor Orb
A sentient sphere with the personality of a scholar.
Soulbound Chain
Whatever attaches to the end of this chain is magically bound until the next dawn.
Cowardly Magic Carpet
Don't expect it to stick around when threatened.
Ride the Carpet
Harbin's Lucky Die
A seemingly ordinary gambling die that's said to bring good luck.
Bad Luck Protection
When you roll a 1 on an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag> you reroll the die and use the new roll.
Belt of Frost Giant Strength
Imbues its wearer with immense physical power.
Bowl of Commanding Water
A basin 1 foot in diameter and about half as deep. It hums with magical energy.
Eyes of Charming
Two magical lenses with accompanying frame.
Charming Stare

Place the lenses to your face attempting to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charm</LSTag> up to 6 humanoids, preventing them from attacking you. You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> in dialogue.
Handy Haversack
A backpack made up of several small extradimensional pockets.
Your carrying capacity is increased to 250% of its base value.
Badge of the Watch
A badge worn by high ranking guardsmen in Neverwinter. It's a long way from home.
Mimir
Also known as a speaking skull, this magical item acts as an encyclopedia to scholars in the outer planes.
Bag of Holding
A magical satchel connected to a large extradimensional space.
Your carrying capacity is increased to 1000% of its base value.
Skeleton Key
Capable of changing its shape to fit any lock.
Dimensional Shackles
When activated these shackles link themselves to an immovable extradimensional space.

Attempt to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrain</LSTag> (<LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">DC</LSTag>30) an enemy. They cannot move, <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against the affected entity have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>, and the entity's Attack Rolls and Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
Has no effect on Huge or Gargantuan creatures.
Empowered Guardian Emblem
An ornate gem-encrusted pin infused with divine magic.
Kyrzin's Ooze
A disgusting goo sealed in a jar that slowly shifts and moves, as if endlessly exploring the jar's interior.
Black Crystal Tablet
This tablet reveals many secrets, most of which should stay that way.
Profane Knowledge
Read from the tablet, striking <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FEARED">Fear</LSTag> deep into a creature's heart.
Make a Wisdom saving throw (<LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">DC</LSTag>15), on a fail go <LSTag Type="MADNESS" Tooltip="FEARED">Mad</LSTag>.
Orb of Skoraeus
Said to be infused with the wisdom and power of the god Skoraeus, this polished stone orb is veined with iridescent crystal that seems to glow from within.
Exceptional Dark Vision
Compendium of Furtive Techniques
This book outlines several lesser known martial techniques.
Orb of Imminent Scrying
Staring into this crystal ball reveals your immediate future.
Clairvoyance
Gain an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">reaction</LSTag>.
Book of Exalted Deeds
The supreme written authority of goodness in all the multiverse.
At the beginning of your turn, heal for [1].
Toxin Shielding
The holder can no longer be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag>.
Book of Vile Darkness
A tome of ineffable wickedness, a reference work of evil authored, edited and compiled by some of the most powerful and maleficent entities across the multiverse.
Infernal Gambit
While in combat, if you don't deal any damage, you take [1] at the end of your turn.
Unwavering
The cursed knowledge flowing within you prevents fear from affecting you.
Distracted
Vile thoughts constantly swarm your mind, receiving <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Suspended Influence
Suffering a critical hit has left the Ioun stone temporarily inert.
A small stone about the size of a fingernail dedicated to the god Ioun. It contains formidable power but is vulnerable to damage.
Suffering a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> will temporarily render the Ioun stone inert.
Stormy Ioun Stone
Verdant Ioun Stone
Roseate Ioun Stone
Umbral Ioun Stone
Scarlet Ioun Stone
Radiant Ioun Stone
Brambleheart Quiver
A basic quiver made of wood. Favored among the druids of the grove.
Quiver of Elemental Chaos
Each slot in this quiver is connected to a different elemental plane.
Select Element
Select which elemental plane to pull arrows from.
Fire Arrows
Frost Arrows
Lightning Arrows
Poison Arrows
Superior Greatarrows
Elemental Arrows
Elemental Arrows: Fire
Elemental Arrows: Frost
Elemental Arrows: Lightning
Elemental Arrows: Poison
You ranged attacks deal an additional [1].
Hunter's Boon
Greater Hunter's Boon
Superior Hunter's Boon
Receive a +[1] bonus to ranged weapon attack rolls. If the wielder has at least [2] levels in the Ranger class, the bonus increases to +[3].
Receive a +[1] bonus to ranged weapon attack and damage rolls. If the wielder has at least [2] levels in the Ranger class, the bonus increases to +[3].
Soldier's Boon
Greater Soldier's Boon
Studied Strikes
Receive a +[1] bonus to melee weapon attack rolls. If the wielder has at least [2] levels in the Fighter class, the bonus increases to +[3].
Receive a +[1] bonus to melee weapon attack and damage rolls. If the wielder has at least [2] levels in the Fighter class, the bonus increases to +[3].
Dimensional Quiver
Every time an arrow is pulled from this quiver another immediately appears in its place.
Grimoire of the Green Arts
A collection of druidic spells are detailed in this tome.
Tome of Celestial Healing
This tome outlines various healing magics.
Serotonin Release
Whenever you heal another creature, you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_ACUITY">Arcane Acuity</LSTag> for 2 turns.
Book of Many Spells
A thick leather-bound enchanted tome popular among up and coming wizards.
You gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">spell attack rolls</LSTag>.
Codex of the Arcanes
A legendary tome of great power.
Superior Arcane Enchantment
Infernal Archive
An chronology of various well known demons throughout history.
Guiding Hand
The first <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">spell attack</LSTag> made in combat always hits.
Tome of Lost Knowledge
An ancient tome that's mostly illegible. The few pages that remain contain esoteric secrets few were meant to know.
You can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Hex">Hex</LSTag> without expending a spell slot.
Tome of Clear Thought
Holding this tome relaxes the mind, preventing intrusive or distracting thoughts.
Vitality Thief
On successfully damaging an enemy creature with a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">melee weapon attack</LSTag>, there is a [1]% chance you restore a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.
Tome of Ethereal Currents
Arcane slivers of the weave emanate from the pages within.
Eldritch Cultivation
<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag> has [1] additional projectile.
Mourningsteel Obol
A worn coin made of mourningsteel, a metal formed below battlefields steeped in blood.
Sea Serpent's Pin
A pin dedicated to Omgar, the legendary sea serpent.
Serpent Strikes
Your melee attacks have a chance to inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ALCH_TOXIN_SERPENTVENOM_CONDITION">Serpent Fang Toxin</LSTag>.
Worghide Leather Frog
Dragonscale Leather Frog
Training Weights
Receive a +[1] bonus to unarmed attack rolls. If the wielder has at least [2] levels in the Monk class, the bonus increases to +[3].
Receive a +[1] bonus to unarmed attack and damage rolls. If the wielder has at least [2] levels in the Monk class, the bonus increases to +[3].
Steel Crowbar
A sturdy and useful tool.
While not in combat you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Athletics">Athletics</LSTag> checks.
Belt of Primal Recall
A comfortable hide belt once owned by a berserker.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on attacks against beasts.
Belt of the Raid Leader
The belt of a fearsome champion.
Belt of Forbidden Harmony
A belt celebrating the impossible balance between Shar and Selune.
Beast Totem
A small wooden idol carved into the shape of several different beasts.

When you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Rage</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_WildShape">Wild Shape</LSTag>, gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Momentum</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Totem of Dread
Whatever this is meant to represent, it is of great importance to the Illithid.

When you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Rage</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_WildShape">Wild Shape</LSTag>, gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="JWL_Status_TotemDread">Thirst for Dominance</LSTag> for [1] turns. If you don't deal any damage, you take [2] at the end of your turn.
Thirst for Dominance
Gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">melee attack</LSTag> and damage rolls.
Spirit Totem
A small wooden idol dedicated to renowned forest spirits.
Phatasmal Guardian

While not <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Raging</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_WildShape">Wild Shaped</LSTag>, if your health drops below [1]% gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GREATER_INVISIBILITY">"Greater Invisibility"</LSTag> for [2] turn.
Ornate Dragon Totem
Carefully crafted by artisans from across the sea, this totem is imbued with great power.

When you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Rage</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_WildShape">Wild Shape</LSTag>, gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ALCH_POTION_FLYING">Flying</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Booyahg Bloodwell Vial
Goblin spellcasters, or "Booyahgs" act as shamanistic healers for their tribe.
Sorcerous Blood
Increases your <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag> by [1].
Corrupted Bloodwell Vial
The blood in this vial is foul but powerful.
When a melee attack hits you, the attacker has a chance to suffer <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ACID">Acid</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Blood of Ahmarreld
A bloodwell vial from the ancient and powerful sorcerer Ahmarreld.
When dealing damage with a cantrip you have a [1]% chance to restore a 1st level <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.
Dragon Bloodwell Vial
The blood of a powerful dragon is held within.
The enchanted mixture within taps deep into your bloodline, increasing your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Points</LSTag> by [1].
Dragon Bloodwell Vial: Depleted
The <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Points</LSTag> granted from the bloodwell vial are depleted. A <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will restore them.
Houndmaster's Whistle
A metal whistle capable of producing a high pitched whistle used to draw the attention of nearby animals.
Training Whistle

The wielder's summoned creatures within [1] receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="JWL_Status_WhistleBeastBuff">Attentive</LSTag>, granting them +[2] to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>, attack, and damage rolls. Has no effect on Undead or Constructs.
Attentive
Creature has a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>, attack, and damage rolls.
Silver Lycan Chime
The ring of this bell emanates with the weave.
Silver Bells

The wielder's summoned creatures within [1] receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="JWL_Status_WhistleBeastBuff">Inspired</LSTag>, increasing movement speed by [2] and granting them +[3] to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>, attack, and damage rolls. Has no effect on Undead or Constructs.
Inspired
Creature has an additional [1] movement speed and a +[2] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>, attack, and damage rolls.
Cerberus Whistle
This whistle releases a terrible tone that drives creatures into a frenzy.
Droning Buzz

The wielder's summoned creatures within [1] receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="JWL_Status_WhistleCerberusBuff">Frenzied</LSTag>, gaining an <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">Extra Attack</LSTag>, a +[2] bonus to attack rolls, and [3] additional <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Maximum Hit Points</LSTag>. This effect scales with character level. Has no effect on Undead or Constructs.
Frenzied

Creature has an <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">Extra Attack</LSTag>, a +[1] bonus to attack rolls, and [2] additional <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Maximum Hit Points</LSTag>. This effect scales with character level.
Witch's Whistle
A whistle carved from bone. Its screeching sound seems to rouse the undead.
Banshee Wail

The wielder's summoned Undead creatures within [1] receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="JWL_Status_WhistleWitchBuff">Grave Touch</LSTag>, adding [2] to attacks. This effect scales with your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
Grave Touch
Your attacks do an additional [1]. This effect scales with the summoner's <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
Thayan Femur
The femur of a once great necromancer.
Constant Chattering
The wielder's summoned Undead creatures within [1] have a chance to inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FEARED">Fearful</LSTag> for 2 turns when damaging a creature with a melee attack.
Chance to inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FEARED">Fearful</LSTag> when doing damage with melee attacks.
Gibbering Bell
A sentient bell that can telepathically communicate with nearby undead.
It Tolls For Thee

The wielder's summoned Undead creatures within [1] use your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> and have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on attacks against any target that doesn't have all of its hit points, provided it's not a construct, an ooze, a plant, or an elemental.

Affected entity uses the summoner's <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> and has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on attacks against any target that doesn't have all of its hit points, provided it's not a construct, an ooze, a plant, or an elemental.
Dealbreaker
Raphael's golden fiddle. It radiates with incredible power.
Devilish Charms
When a melee attack hits you, the attacker is <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag> for 1 turn. This effect can only occur once per turn.
Bag of Tricks
A bag is filled with small round balls. There is seemingly no bottom.

Throw one of the balls inside the bag, creating a small smoke cloud that <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinds</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING_HEAVILY_OBSCURED">Heavily Obscures</LSTag> creatures within it.
Stone of Good Luck
A carved stone said to bring good luck to its owner.
Gain 2 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="LuckPoint">Luck Points</LSTag>.
Stone of Good Luck: Depleted
The <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="LuckPoint">Luck Points</LSTag> granted from the stone are depleted. A <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will restore them.
Weave Entwinement
Strike a creature with the key, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SILENCED">Silencing</LSTag> them for 3 turns.
Goblin War Banner
A small banner carried by a goblin into battle. It invigorates nearby allies with toxic energies.
Absolute's Corruption
You and nearby allies within [1] do an additional [2].
Affected entity does an additional [1] with attacks.
Mourningsteel War Banner
A cloth banner with a hilt made of mourningsteel, a metal formed below battlefields steeped in blood, made in remembrance to an unknown knight.
Remember the Fallen
You and nearby allies within [1] gain a +[2] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Affected entity has a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Consecrated War Banner
A banner dedicated to, and supposedly blessed by, the god Savras.
Radiant Courage

You and nearby allies within [1] do an additional [2] and inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Radiating Orb</LSTag> with attacks. Secondary effect can only occur once per turn per target.

Affected entity does an additional [1] and inflicts <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Radiating Orb</LSTag> with attacks. Secondary effect can only occur once per turn per target.
Battle Standard of Infernal Power
Hell-forged with infernal iron, this twisted metal banner holds the soul of a quasit inside.
Quasit Retaliation

You and nearby allies within [1] gain +[2] bonus to weapon <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack rolls</LSTag> and deal [3] to enemy attackers after being hit by a melee attack. Secondary effect can only occur once per turn per target.

Affected entity has an additional +[2] to weapon <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack rolls</LSTag> and deals [3] to enemy attackers after being hit by a melee attack. Secondary effect can only occur once per turn per target.
Devout Follower
If you are a follower of this deity, your <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">maximum hit points</LSTag> increases by [1]. This effect scales with your level.
Holy Symbol of Kelemvor
A small and ancient stone coin with the symbol of Kelemvor engraved on it.
Balance the Scales
Your melee weapon attacks do an additional [1] and [2].
Holy Symbol of Silvanus
A smooth wooden token carved with the symbol of Silvanus on the front.
Oak Father's Boon
You restore an additional [1] when healing a creature, including yourself.
Holy Symbol of Lolth
A small brooch proudly displaying the Spider Queen's emblem.
Spider's Kiss

Successfully damaging a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag> creature with a melee attack guarantees a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>. Effect can only occur once per combat.
Holy Symbol of Moradin
A belt clasp emblazoned with the symbol of the dwarf god Moradin.
Bulwark of the All-Hammer
Healing another creature has a 25% chance to put <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SANCTUARY">Sanctuary</LSTag> on yourself for 2 turns.
Holy Symbol of Bahamut
A small pin, meant to be worn on the chest, brandishing the crest of the Angel of the Seven Heavens.
The Justice Within
When you deal damage with a levelled spell, heal yourself for [1].
Holy Symbol of Eilistraee
A small token dedicated to the drow sword goddess of beauty and freedom.
Moon Maiden's Mark
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> with shortswords, longswords, and greatswords. In addition, you gain a +2 bonus to melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Holy Symbol of Helm
A worn and weathered copper coin. Despite its age, the symbol of the god Helm is still clearly visible.
The Watcher's Vigilance
Healing another creature increases their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 1 for 2 turns. In addition, you restore an additional [1] when healing a creature, including yourself.
Affected entity's <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> is increased by 1.
Holy Symbol of Mielikki
A small token fashioned in the form of Mielikki, the goddess of forests.
Galloping Winds
Healing another creature grants them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Momentum</LSTag> for 1 turns and you restore [1] of your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>.
Holy Symbol of Ilmater
A crude a simple token made of painted wood dedicated to The Crying God.
Ilmater's Mercy

Healing another creature grants them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="JWL_Status_SymbolIlmater">Ilmater's Preservation</LSTag> for 1 turn. In addition, healing another creature has a 12% chance to restore a 1st level <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.
Effected entity swells with radiant stability. Only a hit that deals at least [1] damage can damage it.
Holy Symbol of Correlon Larethian
A small pin, meant to be worn on the chest, dedicated to the elven god of art and magic.
The Protector's Boon

You gain an additional charge of <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelDivinity">Channel Divinity</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag>, depending on your chosen class(es).
Unwavering Spirit
You gain immunity to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>.
Holy Symbol of Corellon: Depleted (Divinity)
The <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelDivinity">Channel Divinity</LSTag> granted from the holy symbol are depleted. A <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will restore them.
Holy Symbol of Corellon: Depleted (Oath)
The <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag> granted from the stone are depleted. A <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> will restore them.
Graceful Mending
On a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, you heal yourself for [1] as long as the target isn't a construct, an ooze, a plant, or an elemental.
Only a Cleric or Paladin can make use of this.
Only a Wizard can make use of this.
Only a Warlock can make use of this.
Only a Sorcerer can make use of this.
